mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY fan_count DESC, like_count DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, avatar = #{avatar}, signature = #{signature}, follow_count = #{followCount}, fan_count = #{fanCount}, like_count = #{likeCount}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (openid, username, avatar, signature, follow_count, fan_count, like_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{openid}, #{username}, #{avatar}, #{signature}, #{followCount}, #{fanCount}, #{likeCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
